channel.title: CVE Feed for HP -- HP-UX Directory Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HP -- HP-UX Directory Server

item.title: CVE-2010-3282|2024-08-07T03:03:18.937Z -- hp -- hp-ux%20directory%20server
item.description: 389 Directory Server before 1.2.7.1 (aka Red Hat Directory Server 8.2) and HP-UX Directory Server before B.08.10.03, when audit logging is enabled, logs the Directory Manager password (nsslapd-rootpw) in cleartext when changing cn=config:nsslapd-rootpw, which might allow local users to obtain sensitive information by reading the log.
